publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3390 Sandra White: Energy Efficient Housing—That the Parliament welcomes the commitment in the Scottish budget for the provision of £30 million to provide almost 100,000 homes with energy efficiency advice and assistance with insulation and believes that this scheme will benefit some of the most vulnerable members of society and will contribute to a welcome reduction in fuel poverty.

S3M-3390 Energy Efficient Housing (lodged on 4 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Wilson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, John Wilson*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Ian McKee*, Alasdair Allan*, Christine Grahame*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Brian Adam*

S3M-3390 Sandra White: Energy Efficient Housing—That the Parliament welcomes the commitment in the Scottish budget for the provision of £30 million to provide almost 100,000 homes with energy efficiency advice and assistance with insulation and believes that this scheme will benefit some of the most vulnerable members of society and will contribute to a welcome reduction in fuel poverty. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Bill Wilson, Shirley-Anne Somerville, John Wilson, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Ian McKee, Alasdair Allan, Christine Grahame, Joe FitzPatrick, Brian Adam, Bob Doris*, Keith Brown*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3390 Energy Efficient Housing (lodged on 4 February 2009) Michael Matheson*
